column4: I have been having sound problems. I have read through the help stuff on the ubuntu website. I had sound for awhile, but when I was trying to get  sound to come out of my front speaker (my motherboard has built in 7.1 sound) I broke my sound. I don't know how to undo what I did, and I can't find the site again. Now I have no sound at all. I have tried searching for information on ubuntu.com and in google I just can't find anything that will work. Does anyo
If you can't find help here, try ubuntuforums.org
Do you have any gnome panels at all?
If so, right click > add to panel. Task list is under there.
